style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 25px;color: #5A0C00;background-color: #FFDF97;left: 23.75%;top: 12.28%;width: 52.50%;height: 5.69%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;font-weight: bold;border: solid 1px;

text:
ある所にエーという
嘘しか言わない娘がいました
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 16px;color: #5A0C00;background-color: #FFDF97;left: 4.75%;top: 72.78%;width: 41.50%;height: 5.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
またビーという
正直な娘がいました
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 16px;color: #5A0C00;background-color: #FFDF97;left: 53.92%;top: 72.78%;width: 41.50%;height: 5.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text: これは２人が恋に落ち、必然的に、別れるまでの物語
